rowset.name: messages
rowset.row:
Hi LC,

Did you forget to take the corp taxes from the payout?

i'll kick your ass bitch!!!!


--------------------------------
EUTZ Activity
From: Gynax Gallenor
Sent: 2013.07.15 12:28
To: Conquering Darkness,

That's rights foks, it's our favourite time again... Evemails with Uncle Gynax.

I have been trying to organise activity for us in EUTZ, but I have been failing miserably.

So, I am delegating.

Connall has kindly stepped up and offer to organise some stuff, but I know for a fact he will need help, so if anyone is interested in helping out, get in touch.

My idea is pretty simple, we have two or three people who take the initiative and make sure stuff happens in the EUTZ, on one or two days a week, and ideally picking a regular timeslot for that to happen.

By having multiple people involved, it means we are less vulnerable to the vagaries of real life, and it smothers the "Ah sure fuck it, it's grand this week" demon I know too well.


In a similar vein, if any of you feel there is stuff we as a corp need to do and do not, by all means give me a shout with your idea but be prepared to be put in charge of it. :)

I would also like a similar idea for weekend activities, I think we should scrimmage more with the Germans and the Cylons, and we also need to be a more appreciative and organised on the scanning front.

Some things will need ISK, and the corp wallet is not the healthiest at the moment, but hopefully we can come up with a few ideas to help on that front.

Finally, for those of you who are still reading, isn't that Pflepsen guy a dick? :)

Not sure, but if I do, I can create my own branches locally. I'll try a few things out and let you know.

Thansk for all the work on this.


--------------------------------
Re: Re: PI Web code
From: Lumierre Carmody
Sent: 2013.07.14 00:59
To: Gynax Gallenor,

I am learning as I go. Do I need to give you any permissions on this repository before you can create a branch?

Do you know how to use git?

From: Lumierre Carmody

Hi Gynax,

Here is a github of the pi tool that I showed you about a week ago.
https://github.com/Colin-Hu/CD-Gynax
I am fairly new to github, so if I have configured something wrong, please do not hesitate to inform me.

I will be on vacation for the next 3 weeks, if there are any issues getting the scripts to work, feel free to e-mail me at colin529@gmail.com.

Lumierre Carmody

That's rights foks, it's our favourite time again... Evemails with Uncle Gynax.

I have been trying to organise activity for us in EUTZ, but I have been failing miserably.

So, I am delegating.

Connall has kindly stepped up and offer to organise some stuff, but I know for a fact he will need help, so if anyone is interested in helping out, get in touch.

My idea is pretty simple, we have two or three people who take the initiative and make sure stuff happens in the EUTZ, on one or two days a week, and ideally picking a regular timeslot for that to happen.

Some things will need ISK, and the corp wallet is not the healthiest at the moment, but hopefully we can come up with a few ideas to help on that front.

Greetings Bomber Pilots!

The past few days in Bombers Bar have been very exciting, and we would like to this opportunity to tell you about some of these things that have been going on, as well as talk about the future of Bombers Bar.

First off, I would like to personally thank VisualNarcotics and Irish Death'Reaper for the excellent work that they have been doing in coordinating and running fleets. Just today, the fleet was able to secure three dread kills because of their efforts:

Kill: Hemo Toxine (Naglfar)
Kill: Mitty M (Revelation)
Kill: Amphetamine Toxine (Moros)

Of course, the fleet didn't stop there, and continued to kill many more shinies including the following:

Kill: Octavian Princeps (Scorpion Navy Issue)
Kill: Pathos Meson (Widow)

Now I would like you to take a closer look at the Widow killmail. That killmail is the perfect example of what we do here at Bombers Bar and why it's so freaking awesome. There are 18 pilots involved in that kill, and each and every single pilot is from a different corporation. Just think about that for a second.

Fleet commanders, recons, scanners, scouts... everyone played their own part. Yet none of these pilots have any loyalty to each other beyond the purple in their overview. None of them could have done it without everyone. We here at Bombers Bar are not a corporation, alliance, or coalition. We are just a group of pilots looking to do something greater together.

This community survives on people's participation and contributions, and we are always looking for more people to join our team.

Are you interested in becoming a bomber/blops FC?
Do you have a black ops and actually want to use it?
Can you light a covert cyno, and enjoy chasing targets?

Even if you're a beginner bomber pilot, or even an industrialist (gasp!) speak up and see how you can help. We're always open for suggestions on how to make our community better, and more than welcoming to everyone and anyone who wants to help organize New Eden's largest public fleets.

Happy Bombing!
Jayne Fillon

P.S. If you'd like to learn more, you can ask in the "Bombers Bar" channel, or join our teamspeak and say hello!

TS: voice.bombersbar.org
PW: bbfun

I returned to Caprica today and found my Anathemia "Lookfar" floating at the Darkness POS. When I went to get it I found that it was partially stripped and mods were off line. By my fitting records it is missing a Salvager I Relic Analyzer I Data Analyzer I Overdrive Injector System I.. I don't mind so much that people use my less expensive non faction ships,. But I DO MIND removing mods and leaving the ship floating in space.

Hi Gynax,

Here is a github of the pi tool that I showed you about a week ago.

I will be on vacation for the next 3 weeks, if there are any issues getting the scripts to work, feel free to e-mail me at colin529@gmail.com.

Lumierre Carmody

All,

For those of you that ran sites on Thursday night. You should have all received an additional payment of 14823213.25. I currently still have a sell order hanging from some of the sleeper loot. Apologies for the delay in full payment.

Lumierre Carmody

Sadly, I don't have the gas you're looking for. However, I have:

866 Bistot
1780 Coolant
28 Electromechanical Hull Sheeting
202 Fullerite-C320
492 Fullerite-C540
1167 Robotics

--------------------------------
Gas Huffing
From: Gynax Gallenor
Sent: 2013.07.10 18:04
To: Conquering Darkness,

Hey all,

Just letting you know that while C320 and C540 is the most valuable, I need all gas types for my reactions (especially C70, C28 and C84 right now), and I have this tendency to quote and fill orders for stuff in short supply very quickly.

Of course, I still will buy anything.

I just tend to buy stuff I need real fast like. :)

Hi Everyone,
I want to thank everyone who was involved in the downtime to downtime fleets of the past few days. The ability to run these fleets is a testament of how much we have grown in the last few months with all of your help.
Some of you may have noticed that Gantrithor105 is no longer a part of the Warp to Me Incursion leadership team. He recently stepped down due to lack of time because of real life. This leaves Canyon Vjourytant and Sparta93 as the remaining leadership, along with a fantastic officer and FC team. If anyone has an issues or ideas or want to be a training FC, please contact any of us by private convo or eve mail.

Finally, we want everyone to be aware of all of the SRP rules involving WTM. Some of you may have heard this before but it is nice to have on paper:
• You must send 10mil isk to the Warpto SRP corporation when your join fleet
• If you paid into the SRP and lose your ship in one of our fleets you will get some isk back
• If the loss was due to Logi, FC or Site error you will get loss mail value minus drops up to 2bil
• If the loss was due to player error, such as taking the wrong gate or not broadcasting, you will get ¼ loss mail value minus drops up to 500mil
• Logi are always covered for free up to 200mil. If a logistics pilot wants higher coverage they are welcome to pay the 10mil for normal coverage.

From Sparta93
Wtm leadership

Gentlemen,

I am pleased to announce another BB SKEWL happening. For those of you that have never attended A BB SKEWL, we cover basic Covert ops pvp tactics, this will help you excel in the average BB fleets and will answer any questions you may have been afraid durring fleet operations. Please stow the troll and pride. Come with your questions and Johnnny Freedom and I will do our best to answer them. We will be covering how bookmarks work, how Bombs work, Fitting, Aligning and any other questions you have been afraid to ask! I will look forward to seeing all of you new guys there and expect to see alot of the vetrans there to assist you and answer your questions! The Op will form up 18:00 SUNDAY in Jita you will have time to fit up and get organised and we will move out from there. We will move towards desto system and we may have a chance to face off with the condor bar for some test runs. Bomb Type and Desto will be advertised in fleet. Cant wait to see you there!

-Epocolipto

A bunch of us were discussing this the other day, and I came across this guide to implants and clones that is a bit different to the one I read and linked on Jester's Trek.

Definitely worth a read:

http://fleeonsight.blogspot.co.uk/2013/07/guide-implant-sets.html

Hey all,

Just reminding you all that the Germans are asking for another scrimmage fight tomorrow evening. Not sure of the exact time, but since myself and Aiko are not around, Malromen is organising it this time.

I believe they are asking for 5 v 5 in T1 cruisers again.

If any of you feel like getting the practice in, get in touch with Mal so that we can get something together for them.

If you are a pilot with cyno v and can provide hunter killing or return cyno then please send me a private evemail so i can make a list with your possible availability (ie. EU or US)

THANKS,
VISUALNARCOTICS (SFC)

Just ot make life simple, the total amount paid was

213,217,625.00

Like I said, don't make a big deal of it, but just leave my share in the corp.

Sorry,

You just paid it directly to the sites account. :)

I put 7,000 blocks into Warface, Stripper, Phoenix and Darkness.

28,000 blocks @ 14,343.29 = 401,612,120.00

''The how to Pimp My Ship Center''

Logi Fitz and armor tanking explained

for Other racial fits pls revret to > ;(not enough room to link all);
''TDF-Amarr-Fitz''
''TDF-Gallente-Fitz''
''TDF-Minmatar-Fitz''

Pure armor tank ftw,


Reactive armor give's the same base 15% resist as the damage control
but adds more resist over time and dps taken, untill u leave the system
so pls fit pure armor tanks !
this has an exception for a few ships, for example ...
the Logi's, marauders, and minmatar ships, cause of low armor buffer hitpoints.
or stuff like frigates in pvp lol then and only then u should fit a DCU!!
if u should hit structure , there is somthing horrible wrong and your ded prolly


ok, we want a good base overall resist ,
u need good resist for one of each type
starting from your base lowest resist

now the minimal buffer for ships should be like this in order to withstand all waves

(ahp)(without slaves)
8-10k for logi's
12+k for t3/cruiser
18-24k for battleships

BUT incursion tanking aint that hard
so , ill explain how this works for incursions

Sansha do EM/Thermal for lasors , KIN/Expl for torps

in vanguard sites u have em/thermal damage mostly and alittle bit kin/exp
in assault u have heavy em/thermal damage and not so much kin/exp
in hq u got both heavy laser and torp damage
in moms u got bomber damage on top of this all, that will volly battlships for 15k+

so in order to survive MOM sites , in any ship u need 1x 1600 plate and 1x trimark armor rig
u need all resist above 70, one of each type above 75 and the Logistic's near/over 80%
more or less than this is not aprooved unless specifeid

for em OR thermal, one should be 70% the other 75% this is the primairy damage done
and
for kin OR expl, one should be good always , kinetic was choosen for this, for hq u need to add expl
on most ships expl is the weakest, but your better off with 3x types above 70-75%
damage taken is not based on your lowest resist but actual %tage

u need an afterburner on all logi's and cruisers for HQ and mom
u fit a mwd/ab on battlecruiser and battleships for HQ but NOT for MOM

we have certain fleet types wih a reason, and use certain ships only for it

1. non moving sniping fleets (more tracking and optimal range)
2. fast moving mwd high dps fleets (heavy webs)
3. blitz fleets that fit 4 damage mods minimal and run 2 logi maximal

ALL THE FITZ SHOWN IN THE MAILING LIST'S THAT HAVE A ACTIVE HARDENER !
U CAN RUN 1 ACTIVE HARDENER MOD LIKE A DCU , BUT U SHOULD USE PASSIVE ONES!!
THESE FITS ARE FOR EXAMPLE, CORE X-TYPE HARDENERS CAN BE REPLACED (but are pro)
HEAVY ENERGY NEUTING IN SITES !!

IT IS ALWAYS THE FC"S DUTY TO MANNAGE DAMAGE CONTROLL BY PROPER TARGET CALLING!!


The Logi Fitz : (under contruction but here are a few example's)


Armor pvp
Basic cheap guardian , for l4 and 5 pilots

Guard l4

Guardian

Guardian

Guardian

í-Guard
is not viable for MOM


Oneiros
Oneiros

Oneiros 1600mm
Will need pg imp so u could fit a faction pdu instead of an officer mod only fits using genolution

Oneiros 1600mm v2
needs genolution implants

Oneiros 1600mm v3
needs genlution implants + pg implant

Oneiros 1600mm v4
needs genolution implants + pg implant + cap implants + remote rep imps

Oneiros 1600mm v5
needs genolution implants + pg implant + cap implants + remote rep imps

Oneiros 800mm
is not viable for MOM or HQ


.Feedback and Donations welcome.
Best Regardz Yue Chiyoko

Varos

Sorry about last night,

I was utterly exhausted and should have just gone to bed after the second site, and also should not have agreed to tag targets.

Let me know if you need any more help setting up those POCOs or moving stuff.

thats all I got for now, make me an offer :)

I was just thinking about more ways to improve the health of the wallet.

I think we should put this to the members, but how do you two feel about getting Oma or whoever to collect a tithe for crunching ore?

I was thinking that hte corp gets 10% of the ore that is crunched by the Rorqual, which we can use to make ammo or sell or whatever. 5% is possible too.

We should definitely encourage mining in the hole, and this way, the corp makes a bit from it too.

Curious about what you think before I mention it to the rest of the members.

Gas Huffing
From: Gynax Gallenor
Sent: 2013.07.10 18:04
To: Conquering Darkness,

Hey all,

Gentlemen,

I am pleased to announce another BB SKEWL happening. For those of you that have never attended A BB SKEWL, we cover basic Covert ops pvp tactics, this will help you excel in the average BB fleets and will answer any questions you may have been afraid durring fleet operations. Please stow the troll and pride. Come with your questions and Johnnny Freedom and I will do our best to answer them. We will be covering how bookmarks work, how Bombs work, Fitting, Aligning and any other questions you have been afraid to ask! I will look forward to seeing all of you new guys there and expect to see alot of the vetrans there to assist you and answer your questions! The Op will form up 18:00 in Jita you will have time to fit up and get organised and we will move out from there. We will move towards desto system and we may have a chance to face off with the condor bar for some test runs. Bomb Type and Desto will be advertised in fleet. Cant wait to see you there!

-Epocolipto
